body:
depends on PR #28960 
depends on PR #28959 
depends on PR #28623

Following the commits from the PR #28623, all the packages depending upon boost have been replaced with Boost.with_default_variants. This commit removes the Boost.with_default_variants to variants that packages are precisely dependent upon through build analysis conducted under @trws. This is the second batch of 20 packages with updated boost dependencies.

The focus of this PR is the commit (1e8a18d) as the rest are being reviewed under dependent PRs.
title: Feature/composed boost pkg deps p3
